QuestData.Title: Branch of the Arcan'dor
QuestData.Description:
You have used the spellstone of Kel'danath to soothe countless withered. Yet it contains merely a shade of the arcan'dor's power, drawn from its slumbering seed.
<Thalyssra holds aloft a gleaming white branch.>
This fell from the tree. Though it is severed, it is not dead - invisible threads of magic bind all pieces of the arcan'dor together.
I have enchanted this branch with a new iteration of Kel'danath's charm spell. With it, you can mend the arcane essence of even more withered. Use it well.
QuestData.RewardText: I never imagined I would spend my time in exile studying withered. Through them, I have learned a great deal about my own people, and the nature of our relationship with the Nightwell.
